patthana23.53:4.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ namicchattaniyataṃ dhammaṃ paccayā anidassanaappaṭigho micchattaniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana23.53:5.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nasammattaniyataṃ dhammaṃ paccayā anidassanaappaṭigho sammattaniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana23.53:6.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ naaniyataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho aniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana23.53:6.3: Hetuyā ekavīsa, adhipatiyā ekavīsa … pe … avigate ekavīsa.
